dublinCore.dc:title: 110 HR 674 EH: To amend title 38, United States Code, to repeal the provision of law requiring termination of the Advisory Committee on Minority Veterans as of December 31, 2009.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to repeal the provision of law requiring termination of the Advisory Committee on Minority Veterans as of December 31, 2009.

section.header: Repeal of sunset provision for advisory committee on minority veterans
section.text: Subsection (e) of section 544 of title 38, United States Code, is repealed.

attestation-group.attestation-date: Passed the House of Representatives July 31, 2008.
